Terms of Service
 
 1. By using this app, you agree to comply with all applicable laws.
 2. The app is provided "as is" without warranties.
 3. You are responsible for the content you share within the app.
 
 Privacy Policy
 
 1. We do not collect personal data without consent.
 2. Any data entered in the app stays on the device and on Supabase database.
 3. We do not share or sell your data to third parties.
